title: request_status Lambda Input
description: The output from the request_status Lambda when retrieving status for a particular recovery job.

asyncOperationId.description: The unique asyncOperationId of the recovery job.

job_status_totals.description: Sums of how many granules are in each particular restoration status.

pending.description: The number of granules that still need to be copied.

success.description: The number of granules that have been successfully copied.

failed.description: The number of granules that did not copy and will not copy due to an error.

granules.description: An array representing each granule being copied as part of the job.

items.description: A granule being copied as part of the job.

granule_id.description: The unique ID of the granule.

status.description: The status of the restoration of the granule. May be 'pending', 'staged', 'success', or 'failed'.
